description: Incredible opportunity to acquire an independent villa for sale in Cercedilla! This property has optimal differential elements and offers multiple possibilities to adapt it to your needs. With 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, this home gives you all the space you need for your family. Enjoy pleasant moments in the spacious living room with fireplace and take advantage of the light in the kitchen. In addition, you can relax in the private garden and have a parking space. The location is perfect, near the center of town, with nearby public transport and a wide range of leisure and dining options. In addition, communication with Madrid is excellent through the A6. Enjoy the tranquility of the mountains, with nearby routes and landscapes, multiple parks and a theater nearby. You will also have all kinds of shops, banks and supermarkets at your fingertips. Don't miss the opportunity to live in this wonderful independent chalet. Contact now for more information!

Gilmar offers an apartment for sale in Cercedilla ready to move into. The property consists of two bedrooms, a living room, a separate kitchen and a bathroom, all with plenty of light. Interior wood carpentry and aluminum exterior. Built-in wardrobes, stoneware floor, natural gas boiler and pellet installation. Mosquito nets on windows. Close to the town center on foot and with a bus stop to Madrid Moncloa at the door of the house. Optimal differential elements. Excellent communications. Located in the center of town a few steps from Calle Mayor, Town Hall and church, with excellent communications to Madrid by RENFE and bus at the door of the house to Moncloa. Spectacular house located in a natural environment with amazing views It consists of two independent houses The main house is distributed over two floors. On the ground floor we find an entrance that gives access to a huge living room with large windows and dream views and a fireplace, a kitchen also with a fireplace, a toilet and a door that gives access to the garage, currently used as part of the house. The first floor consists of 4 bedrooms and two full bathrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom. The second house, is a loft-type room, consists of a huge fully glazed room with access to the garden and a functional kitchen, and a toilet. If something defines this home, it is that it is surrounded by trees and natural beauty and all rooms receive an incredible bath of light. It is an excellent option for nature-loving families. There is the option of renting one of the houses if you want to do a business of this type.

Spectacular House in Cercedilla Engel & Voelkers present a spectacular house in the Sierra de Madrid, right next to the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park with mountain views where you can enjoy tranquility and nature. The house, totally efficient, is equipped with Solar Panels, Aerothermal energy, Underfloor Heating, Electric Shutters, A/C and remote access control. Top quality materials throughout the house. We present 3 floors. The first floor has a courtesy toilet, bedroom with bathroom en suite, living room area with dining room and open space and kitchen with direct access to the terrace, solarium and pool. The second floor consists of three bedrooms, all with fitted wardrobes, 1 bathroom and the master bedroom on suite, wardrobe-dressing room and office area. The ground floor consists of one wine cellar and direct access to the outdoor dining area and pool, kitchen, laundry room and a guest bedroom. The house is currently in the renovation phase with an architect project and materials report included with the price of 690,000 euros and when the house will be finished the price will be 940,000 euros. Engel & Voelkers presents a spectacular fully efficient home located in the beautiful town of Cercedilla. This location has accessible public transportation such as commuter trains, restaurants, health centers, supermarkets and schools. It is located next to the Guadarrama National Park with amazing views in a unique and private environment. An excellent location to share great moments in a great environment and to enjoy the mountains.

Spectacular stone chalet with South orientation and wonderful views.400m2 built on a 1,891m2 plot with an indoor pool.5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 living rooms, 1 games room, tower and 2 kitchens.Closed garage for three cars.Built with the best qualities and in a very quiet area 1km from the FF station.DC. THIS PROPERTY IS SPECIAL BECAUSE Located in the heart of the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park, this unique property has been built with the best qualities, dedicating great care and affection to all the details and selection of its materials.The walls have double insulation, there are no hollow partitions, the double glazed windows with thermal break and a South orientation with privileged views make this home a very cozy place as a first or second residence.Fiber optics can be installed to telework comfortably, and the two floors are independent of each other, making it ideal for investment as rural accommodation as it has a large parking area both inside and outside the property and a large living room. 70m2 games with terrace. High quality barbecue, swimming pool and direct access from the plot to a mountain path.Ideal for outdoor activities such as hiking, cycling, trail running, etc.It even has its own fountain that emanates high-quality water from the Sierra, suitable for consumption.You can also choose to rent one of the floors and live on the other, since they are, if desired, completely independent.It is a very quiet area with no traffic, the property is located at the end of a dead end street.Oil heating with boiler in perfect condition.Possibility of installing aerothermal heating and solar panels. ENVIRONMENT Located within the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park and facing South, it is very bright and enjoys spectacular views, surrounded by nature, with a path that leaves directly from the farm and an oak forest at the back and foot of the Pico de La Peñota.The Los Molinos road and the railway station are just 1km away.of the property. DISTRIBUTION On the ground floor we find 4 double bedrooms, 2 large bathrooms with shower, south facing living room, new equipped kitchen, heated garage for three vehicles with electric door with high quality insulation, storage or workshop area and utility room. boiler.All rooms with built-in wardrobes and radiators.Ceramic terrazzo floor.The structure of the house is made of stone.From the garage you can go up to the upper floor through the tower if you wish.On the upper floor is the main living room with library and fireplace with heat output to four rooms.High quality ceramic floor.The stone arch in the living room is made of granite brought from Extremadura and the one in the library is made of large solid wood.Master bedroom suite with dressing room equipped with opaque glass doors and exterior window.Main bathroom with shower tray with sauna and hydromassage.Kitchen equipped with all appliances in perfect condition.70m2 games room with outdoor terrace ideal for family gatherings and leisure time.On the top floor of the tower there is a room set up as a small library.The house does not need renovation. EXTERIOR Plot of 1,891m2.With barbecue, spring fountain and tool shed that can be expanded.Covered swimming pool currently disused.Bungalows could be installed on the plot and it offers a wide variety of possibilities. SERVICES All services within a few minutes walking, by bike or by vehicle, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and shops, medical centers, Fuenfría hospital, schools, institutes, municipal sports center. TRANSPORT FF Station.DC.Cercedilla, lines C-8 and C-9 Buses: L1.

Apartment in the center of CERCEDILLA of 53m2 200 meters from the town hall. 1-bedroom penthouse apartment 200 meters from the bus stop, town hall and shops, with wooden floors, equipped kitchen, built-in wardrobe and individual electric heating. Perfect for investors, the apartment has been rented for 600e per month, the house needs repairs, changing the floors and painting.It has humidity that the community must solve, it is now in process. The house has white climalit windows with blinds and wooden velux climalit windows, built in 2004, the community is 56 every two months, IBI 74.5 every 3 months and garbage rate 23.18. It has a large 21m2 living room and a 15m2 kitchen, the 12.6m2 bedroom consists of a built-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom. WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER. POSSIBILITY OF 100% FINANCING CONSULT US.

description: Tailor & Key presents, exclusively, an independent Chalet with impressive views of the Sierra de Guadarrama.Located in the town of Cercedilla. The 150 m chalet on a 2400 m plot.It has a large living room and dining room.Kitchen.Three bedrooms with fitted wardrobes.A bathroom.Garage. NEEDS REFORM! It is perfectly connected to Madrid, which is 60 km away.Renfe station and buses. The Town of Cercedilla is located in an incomparable place for lovers of nature and quality of life. For more information regarding the use of the plot, as well as project proposals, contact Tailor & Key. At Tailor & Key we are specialized in the residential and commercial market of Madrid.We offer a comprehensive and personalized service, accompanying our clients throughout the different phases of the real estate cycle, in purchase-sale operations, rentals and comprehensive home renovations. If you are interested in this property or want to receive additional information about our services, do not hesitate to contact us or go to our tailorkey website.com.

Inmobiliaria VOhome propiedades Collado Villalba vende: Piso de 3 dormitorios con ASCENSOR en Urbanización Vistahermosa en la localidad de Cercedilla. La vivienda se encuentra distribuida en amplio hall recibidor, salón comedor con acceso a terraza acristalada de 8 m2, cocina office unida al tendedero, 3 amplios dormitorios con armarios empotrados y 1 baño completo. Toda la vivienda cuenta con suelos de parquet y gres en baños y cocina, ventanas de madera y calefacción individual de gas natural. Este inmueble cuenta con mucha luz por su orientación suroeste. Además está situada en una urbanización privada que cuenta con ascensor, zonas comunes, piscina comunitaria, pista de tenis y zonas verdes. Inmejorable ubicación, muy cercana a colegios, centros comerciales, de ocio y restauración.  Fácil acceso A-6, desde Collado Villalba o Guadarrama, por la carretera de Colmenar (M-607), tomando un desvío por la M-614 hacia Cerceda y el Puerto de Navacerrada y desde Segovia por las carreteras CL-601, M-601, M-602 y M-603. Con un amplio abanico de transportes públicos como tren de cercanías línea C8B (Guadalajara - Madrid-Segovia), o autobuses urbanos e interurbanos que hacen de esta localidad de fácil y rápido acceso a Madrid. Por todo ello, Cercedilla, es la mejor de las opciones si buscas tranquilidad, accesibilidad y todo tipo de servicios en la sierra de Madrid, pero si estar muy lejos del centro de Madrid. En el precio de venta no están incluidos los gastos de compra ( Impuestos de transmisiones patrimoniales/ Notaría / Gestoría / Registro / Intermediación inmobiliaria y/o Financiera). Te financiamos tu vivienda hasta el 100% del valor de compraventa. Tipo de interés fijo: desde 2.25 % Tipo de interés variable: desde Er+0.25 % Para más información, llamar al teléfono gratuito  Pásate a conocernos por nuestra oficina en Collado Villalba (28400) C/ Real, nº48 en el horario de L–V de 09:30h a 14:00h / 17:00h a 20:00h o sábados de 10:00h a 14:00h.

Aliaria manages this exclusive development of 29 homes in Cercedilla with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms, each equipped with a private garage and storage room. The promotion is located in a privileged enclave, on Calle Carmen nº 1 in Cercedilla, in the center of the town and in the heart of the Sierra de Guadarrama, therefore offering a unique location for those seeking to enjoy nature without give up urban comforts. Cercedilla has a complete infrastructure of services, including shops, restaurants, educational centers, health centers and a wide range of outdoor leisure activities. It is the perfect place to settle down and enjoy a balanced and pleasant life in an exceptional natural environment. In addition to its wonderful natural environment, the homes are designed with your comfort and quality of life in mind. Each of them has Aerothermal systems, an efficient and environmentally friendly technology that provides heating and cooling, guaranteeing a pleasant indoor environment in all seasons of the year. As for the qualities, we bet on the renowned Porcelanosa brand to guarantee a high-end finish in every corner of the homes. From the floors to the bathrooms and the kitchen, you will enjoy top quality materials that add a touch of elegance and style to the home. Do not miss the opportunity to be part of this exclusive community and enjoy all the advantages that Cercedilla and its surroundings have to offer.

description: Fantastic opportunity independent villa with 2 floors, 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, in Cercedilla. 264 m2 built. 161 m2 useful. Orientation South - East. Plot of 990 m2. Living room with fireplace. Separate kitchen with access to terrace. Oil heating. Built-in wardrobes, tiled floor, aluminum windows and wooden doors. Private pool. 3 storage rooms. FLOOR 0 Living room 3 rooms 1 toilet 1 bathroom Kitchen room FLOOR 1 2 rooms 1 bathroom 2 large storage rooms DO NOT MISS THIS OPPORTUNITY AND CONTACT US TO MAKE A VISIT. Daurum Estate offers to get the best financing for you up to 100% of the sale value, whether our home is ours or not. INFORMATION WITHOUT COMMITMENT in the same telephone number of the advertisement. In addition, the possibility of renovation services to accommodate the home to your liking.

Grupo Casa 10 sells a beautiful 144m2 villa built on ONE FLOOR (117m2) to renovate with 3 bedrooms (originally 4 bedrooms), 2 bathrooms, on a 417m2 plot in a private urbanization with swimming pool and garage. From the main door and crossing a beautiful porch of about 10m2, a hallway distributes the different rooms. The living room is divided into two rooms and is L-shaped, it enjoys large windows that allow in natural light and a stone fireplace that creates a warm and cozy atmosphere. The kitchen is independent and has direct access to the garden, where you can enjoy a summer dining corner. Currently there are three large bedrooms because the fourth was joined to the living room, giving you flexibility in the use of spaces. The property has a garage (22m2) for one car and storage room (5m2) Located in the middle of nature, this property has pleasant common areas, and a swimming pool at the top, where you can experience the feeling of being in harmony with nature. You can contact me at Phone Number six twenty twenty eleven zero six, I'm Ana Peartree.

suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Detached house in Calle de Emilio Serrano, 32'}
description: NAVACASA SELLS. - STONE HOUSE OF 317 M2 BUILT, IN FRONT OF THE CERCEDILLA RENFE STATION! Opportunity for INVESTORS, PROMOTERS, REFORMISTS and BUILDERS! Stone building to rehabilitate with many possibilities for different businesses (educational, sports, cultural, residential, etc. ). It was formerly a hospitality business with a bar/cafeteria on the ground floor, and two dining rooms on the upper floor and below deck, space for warehouses, a camera, etc... Good ubication. 3 FLOORS OF 106 M2 each. With small backyard. URBAN PLANNING CERTIFICATE: Allows the following uses: -Homes in category 1 - subzone C2 - Detached or semi-detached homes. - Commercial in all its categories. -Offices in category 1. -Garage-parking in category 1. -Industry in any category except livestock. -Collective residence in category 1. -Shows in category 1. -Meeting and recreation in category 1. -Religious in all its categories. -Cultural in all its categories. - Sports in 1st and 2nd categories. -Sanitary in categories 1st, 2nd and 3rd. - Public services in categories 1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th. ASK US AND COME SEE IT!

GPHOME SELLS MAGNIFICENT INDEPENDENT VILLA OF RECENT CONSTRUCTION IN ONE OF THE BEST AREAS OF CERCEDILLA WITH A PLOT OF 600M2. The house was built in 2023 and is completely ready to move into. It has all kinds of luxuries and details to enjoy the wonderful views of 7 PICOS. The house has been built on a 600m2 plot and has 175m2. The house has been built on a single floor which makes it even more special and comfortable to live in. It is distributed in a spacious living room with a fully furnished and equipped open kitchen. The living room has a built-in fireplace and direct access to the magnificent plot of the house. The house has 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms. All bedrooms have built-in wardrobes. The house is completely exterior so it has magnificent luminosity. It faces east and has been built with high ceilings that give the house a lot of spaciousness. The house has air conditioning; Built-in barbecue, heating and a large pool to enjoy in summer. Without a doubt, a home on a whim in one of the best areas of the Madrid mountains.

GRUPO CASA10 SELLS (Ana phone number six twenty twenty eleven zero six): Romantic villa of ONE SINGLE FLOOR of 150m2 built in granite masonry on a SEGREGABLE plot of 2200m2 to reform A construction that falls in love. The house is accessed through a beautiful porch. From the entrance you access the living room, the kitchen or the corridor where the 5 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms are distributed. Living room and dining room are divided by a sliding door. This room enjoys a wonderful fireplace and large windows that have sills. The 5 bedrooms are the same size, between 8 and 10m2. All enjoy fitted wardrobes. To avoid moisture problems due to capillarity, the construction was carried out elevated from the ground, and to access the house you have to climb 5 steps, which allowed the construction of a room in the lower part, more used as a storage room. The plot is segregated, flat and wooded and smells of cedar resin, the sensation is indescribable. Inside the plot there is a shed built to store gardening tools. The plumbing and electricity are up to date, it lacks heating and has sewerage. The carpentry is made of wood and in its architecture, the arches do not go unnoticed as was usual in the 50s. The house is located in the municipality of Cercedilla, but closer to the town of Los Molinos, in an area surrounded by nature for hiking, mountain biking or pleasant horseback riding. A house with multiple possibilities to leave it as a movie.

ALEX BENDAYAN REAL ESTATE & INVESTMENT PRIME, exclusively offers this magnificent home(S) for sale in the northern mountains of Madrid. These are two spectacular homes in one, independent entrances, modern interior design, redone with the best qualities in 2022 on a 500M2 plot, preserving the original exterior design, beautiful views, garden plot, porch-gazebo, solarium, cellar, garage for 2 cars. Public transport next door. All kinds of offers in leisure and restaurants. It is located just 600 meters from the center of Cercedilla, very good communication with Madrid via A6, enjoy living in the mountains with its routes and landscapes, multiple parks, and all kinds of shops, banks, supermarkets, schools and a host of services. The chalet is divided into two houses with INDEPENDENT ENTRIES as well as TWO kitchens. It has a total of SIX double BEDROOMS and FOUR BATHROOMS, two with a bathtub, two with a shower tray. This magnificent residence is divided as follows: UPPER FLOOR 105M2 + 25M2 TERRACE ============================= -Three double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes -Two bathrooms -Fully equipped kitchen, island incorporated into the living room -Large living room with fireplace + large dining room -Large terrace -Storage room GROUND FLOOR 95M2 + 35M2 TERRACE ============================= -Three double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes -Two bathrooms (One for people with reduced mobility) -Fully equipped kitchen, island incorporated into the living room -Large living room with fireplace + large dining room -Laundry room -Large terrace QUALITIES ======== Underfloor heating by aerothermal heating (Daikin) hot/cold, aluminum windows with triple-glazed thermal break, mosquito net, thermal blinds, double-insulated chambers, AA energy efficiency, High-quality Marazzi imitation wood porcelain interior floors, non-slip exterior floors, Marazzi imitation wood porcelain tiles. Roca toilets toilets. Be sure to come and see the many possibilities for living and tourist rentals. The information contained herein does not form part of any offer or contract and may be subject to errors, omissions, price change or other modification without notice. ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ Alex Bendayan Real Estate & Investment Prime Madrid & Marbella.

We sell a bright apartment in Cercedilla. The house has two bedrooms, a full bathroom, kitchen with utility room and living room with fireplace and access to the terrace (with the possibility of closing it). The terrace has wonderful views of the mountains. It also has a storage room with ventilation that could be used as an additional space to the house. Saunier Duval boiler (propane gas), refrigerator and washing machine. Exterior garage. It is located in the legendary Peñablanca urbanization, which has a 24-hour concierge, swimming pool for adults and children, tennis court, garden areas and children's area. It has the bus stop at the door and the Renfe station a few minutes walk away. Close to the commercial and leisure area. If you want an apartment in the mountains with many possibilities, come see it.

INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY: The Property is in a state of ruin, making it impossible to occupy it, nor to use it as a home or premises, and the corresponding precautions must be taken in case of access to it. This situation has been especially taken into account when setting the price.   Apartment located in the municipality of Cercedilla, north of the community of Madrid. It has a registered area of 107.67 m2. It has a bedroom, living room, kitchen and bathroom. The environment has basic urban infrastructures (public lighting, electricity supply, sanitation network, drinking water supply and sidewalk curb), which are apparently in good condition. In addition, it has sufficient equipment: commercial, sports, school, welfare, religious, recreational and green areas. The communications of the environment with the rest of the population are sufficient for the needs of the area. Property that has suffered damage by fire, is transferred in the state in which it is found, assuming by the purchaser the adaptation or repair tasks that are necessary with full indemnity for the transferor. Cercedilla is a municipality and Spanish town in the northwest of the Community of Madrid. Located in the Sierra de Guadarrama, it has a population of 7,359 inhabitants (INE 2021).

CAVALIER SELLS. Two beautiful old independent chalets of 406m2 and 63m2 on a landscaped plot of 710m2. In total 469m2 built. The plot has three independent accesses from two streets. Both houses are in their original state, so they REQUIRE COMPLETE AND INTEGRAL REFORM. The beautiful main building, built in 1920 in exposed brick and railway style, has 406m2 distributed over two floors plus a warehouse. The second house is a bright independent villa of 63m2. Both houses show obvious deterioration, so both the main building and the independent house require comprehensive and complete reform of each and every one of its facilities, in addition to rethinking the distribution.

CAVALIER SELLS. Magnificent independent villa, BRAND NEW. TO BE FINISHED. With more than 340m2 and five bedrooms. Built with the best qualities on a 569m2 garden plot. Distributed over two floors plus basement, and just 300m2 from the urban center of Cercedilla.
